name: Large Original Surreal Painting Love in the Teal Rain 18" x 24" Amber Elizabeth Lamoreaux Modern Art
description:
'Love in the Teal Rain' 18" x 24" original surreal painting by artist Amber Elizabeth Lamoreaux . This is an original painting of a couple sharing an umbrella and holding each other close in the teal rain. 

Every painting comes with a unique certificate of authenticity that can be validated online through the EBSQ artists' site. I am a showcased RAW Artist and a member of the EBSQ Artists community. My art is collected all over the world.

*Title: Love in the Teal Rain
*Colors: Shades of teal, light blue, black, white, and gray
*Acrylic painting done using high quality acrylic paints 
*Painted on an 18" x 24" x 3/4" gallery wrapped canvas
*Sides are painted black so no frame is needed
*Varnished with glossy wet paint look finish to perfection
*Arrives wired and ready to hang up!
*Signed on the front and back (with title and date also on back)
*Carefully packaged for shipping and shipped with full insurance

Any pictures of my paintings that show furniture may not be exactly to scale (please see measurements for accurate size). The picture is to give an idea of how the painting may look in a home or office setting. The furniture is not included in a painting purchase.

Feel free to contact me with any questions.

Thanks! 
-Amber

What customers are saying:

"Just received this today. It's absolutely gorgeous and was packaged so well!"

"Amber doesn't need another positive review, but I feel like an art thief right now. I got more than I paid for. :) She under-promised/over-delivered. The piece had great detail that I couldn't see in the preview, the materials are top-notch, the art is appealing (to me), and it can be on the wall in 5 minutes. It was the best-packaged painting I've ever received in the mail, and it came with a CoA."

"I received the painting quickly it was packaged extremely well and it is beatifuuuul. Thank you so much!"

"What a wonderful and vivid piece that is now part of my collection!"

"A very beautiful piece. It has a bold feel. The seller was great about getting it to us. Came ready to hang."


Like my art on Facebook: Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/pages/Amber-Elizabeth-Lamoreaux/229800437046306

name: Large Original Painting Dragonfly Nights Surreal Acrylic Canvas Art Amber Elizabeth Lamoreaux
description:
'Dragonfly Nights' This is a 20" x 32" original acrylic on gallery wrapped canvas surreal painting by Amber Elizabeth Lamoreaux. The dragonflies explore a surreal purple night together as the tree looks on silently. All is bathed in moonlight. 

Every painting comes with a unique certificate of authenticity that can be validated online through the EBSQ artists' site. I am a showcased RAW Artist and a member of the EBSQ Artists community. My art is collected all over the world.

*Title: Dragonfly Nights
*Colors: Shades of vivid purple, black, gray, and white
*Acrylic painting done using high quality acrylic paints 
*Painted on two 16" x 20" x 3/4" gallery wrapped canvas (total measurement displayed 20" x 32")
*Sides are painted black before shipping so no frame is needed
*Varnished with glossy wet paint look finish
*Arrives wired and ready to hang up!
*Signed on the front and back (with title and date also on back)
*Carefully packaged for shipping and shipped with full insurance
